htmlBody: Lots of the content in this post was loosely familiar to me, but what really prompted me to upvote the post was the writing style, which was really engaging, thanks to good structure, good use of headings, and ability to bring a light-hearted style to a heavy topic.

I'm doing a bit of research into fish welfare and this is a super helpful overview - thank you so much for writing it! I also agree with Sanjay that the writing style is great - you could have a future as quick-explainer-blog-writer or some such.
Thank you, I'm so glad it helped!
